item.title: Bitcoin Toolchain Unit Testing And Deterministic Builds
item.description: Bitcoin toolchain, unit testing & deterministic builds Marco Falke Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZJ2t84trKVo https://twitter.com/kanzure/status/1048103693885759489 Introduction Just to continue on what James said about the build system on Bitcoin Core… I am going to talk about deterministic builds. I am MarcoFalke and I also work at Chaincode Labs in NYC. Bitcoin Core Build System The build system is based on autotools, so it should just work anywhere where autotools runs. Just run ./autogen.sh .
